title: The Reading Room
filterKeywords: the reading room books english language
description:
Can we entice you into our Reading Room?

This is the place for lovers of language and literature, those of us who believe that reading is essential, as we seek to rise above the ordinary.

And the Reading room contains a host of extraordinary people. Leading lights of the written word - authors, literary critics, columnists and ideas people - will tantalise your minds with their wordplay, while discussing the ideas and worldviews that form our wonderful literary milieu.

Come step into a world of magic, the place of undiscovered treasures, a room of reading...
